languages.text: "Эта чужачка повадилась отвлекать Лорд-капитана по любому удобному случаю. Ее разговоры отнимают бесценное время".
"The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."
languages.original_text: "Эта чужачка повадилась отвлекать Лорд-капитана по любому удобному случаю. Ее разговоры отнимают бесценное время".

traits.locale_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “那个异形总是抓住一切机会分散舰长大人的注意力，她的谈话浪费了太多宝贵时间。”
languages.original_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."

traits.locale_text: “那个异形总是抓住一切机会分散舰长大人的注意力，她的谈话浪费了太多宝贵时间。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « La xénos semble prendre un malin plaisir à distraire {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à la moindre occasion. À force de lui faire la conversation, elle nous fait perdre du temps. »
languages.original_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."

traits.locale_text: « La xénos semble prendre un malin plaisir à distraire {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} à la moindre occasion. À force de lui faire la conversation, elle nous fait perdre du temps. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «La xenos tiene la costumbre de distraer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán a cada momento. Sus conversaciones ocupan un tiempo muy valioso».
languages.original_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."

traits.locale_text: «La xenos tiene la costumbre de distraer a{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán a cada momento. Sus conversaciones ocupan un tiempo muy valioso».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「あの異種族は隙あらばロード・キャプテンの気をそらす。彼女の会話は貴重な時間を奪っています」
languages.original_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."

traits.locale_text: 「あの異種族は隙あらばロード・キャプテンの気をそらす。彼女の会話は貴重な時間を奪っています」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Xenos hat die Angewohnheit, den Lord Captain bei jeder Gelegenheit abzulenken. Ihre Konversation raubt wertvolle Zeit."
languages.original_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."

traits.locale_text: "Die Xenos hat die Angewohnheit, den Lord Captain bei jeder Gelegenheit abzulenken. Ihre Konversation raubt wertvolle Zeit."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."

languages.text: "Bu zeno da Lord Kaptan'ı yoldan çıkarma fırsatını buldu mu kaçırmıyor. Böyle şeylere harcayacak vakit mi var?"
languages.original_text: "The xenos has a habit of distracting the Lord Captain at every opportunity. Her conversations are taking up precious time."

traits.locale_text: "Bu zeno da Lord Kaptan'ı yoldan çıkarma fırsatını buldu mu kaçırmıyor. Böyle şeylere harcayacak vakit mi var?"
